channel.title: Tele Command, Box Pking
channel.description:
Could someone possibly show me how to make a teleport command, and how could i make a square box of land right like right next to edgeville bank, so that in that box all levels can fight each other, marked out with those wildy posts that the arrow is poiting that. Thanks in advance
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/9184/heresp7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img401/heresp7.png/1/][IMG]http://img401.imageshack.us/img401/heresp7.png/1/w513.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Tele Command, Box Pking
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

Well, first you need to know its x and y coords

1} use “coordson” so you can find the location you want
2} remember that number
3} move 3 steps away (still remember step 2)
4} use "tele

The other part for that you want is “non-wild” areas.
1} search for (in client.java) and search for something “wild” or something(sorry can’t remember it all)
2} the 4 arrows you made, that will be the “x1” “x2” “y1” “y2” parts. you will need to mark there x and y coords
3} Someone will mostly be more helpful than I am on this part. (sorry…)

IF this isn’t what you wanted to know, sorry. I don’t completely understand your question then.

Read full topic
